import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";//#region reducer
const initialState={idleCodes:[]};export const IdleCodesSlice=createSlice({name:"idlecodes",initialState,reducers:{addIdleCode:(state,action)=>{state.idleCodes.push(action.payload);},removeIdleCode:(state,action)=>{const index=state.idleCodes.indexOf(action.payload);state.idleCodes.splice(index,1);}}});export const{addIdleCode,removeIdleCode}=IdleCodesSlice.actions;export default IdleCodesSlice.reducer;//#endregion
